message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first. I think it would be very valuable for you.  I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
Thank you for considering me for the product. I understand its value, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is too low for me.  Could you do $13,000? I'm willing to compromise.

I've considered your previous offer, and while I appreciate your willingness to compromise, I must respectfully decline. I am still unable to meet at $13,000. However, I am willing to go up to $12,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
